title: enta baagyamu
sahitya:
enta bhAgyamu mApAla galgEtivi evvarIdu mujjagamulalO tanak-



anupallavi



centajEri saujanyuDai baliki cinta bAga tolaginci brOcitivi



caraNam



munnu nI samIpamuna velayu sanmunula nella naNimAdi lIlalacE

    dinnagAnu pAlanamu jEsinaTTu nannu gAcitivi tyAgarAjanuta
